visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color for the title, a lighter blue for the subtitle, and a gray color for the axis labels with a font size of 12px. Data series: The data series should include monthly average temperatures for a year, with the name 'Temperature' and data points for each month. Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue to dark blue for the series. Additional configurations: Set the chart background to a light gray color, add a legend with the series name, and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature' and a subtitle 'The subtitle'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, and the y-axis title is 'Temperature (°C)'. The data series, named 'Temperature', includes monthly average temperature data points. The series color is a gradient from light blue to dark blue. The title and subtitle are styled with dark blue and lighter blue colors, respectively, while the axis labels are gray with a font size of 12px. The chart includes a legend and has margins set to 50 pixels on all sides.
